subject: Officiating (Sports)
Computers and the Internet
Basketball
lead_paragraph: If seeing is believing, the N.B.A. is convinced that it will provide its fans with an invaluable tool in its new video rule book at the league’s Web site.
snippet: If seeing is believing, the N.B.A. is convinced that it will provide its fans with an invaluable tool in its new video rule book at the league’s Web site.
